main_definition: lasting or existing forever; timeless, unending.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Lasting forever without an end in time.
meanings_and_examples.example: Many people believe in eternal life after death.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Unchangeable and unvarying over a long period of time.
meanings_and_examples.example: The beauty of the natural world is often described as eternal.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Lasting or existing from the beginning, without any start point in time.
meanings_and_examples.example: Gold has been considered an eternal symbol of wealth and power.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Perpetual recurrence; repetitive over a long period of time.
meanings_and_examples.example: The cycle of the seasons is seen as eternal in nature.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Fully realized and perfected to an immutable state.
meanings_and_examples.example: Some philosophers believe that certain truths are eternal, unchanging across all cultures and times.
